dict.acceptation: 浴室；盥洗室；（带抽水马桶的）厕所；卫生间；

sent.orig: Turn your bathroom a style statement with our range of bathroom wallpaper.
sent.trans: 用一系列的浴室墙纸，把你的浴室换种风格吧。

sent.orig: Love Ran bathroom is the new bathroom manufacturers, the main production Never burstshower rooms, showers, hydrants.
sent.trans: 爱然卫浴是新型的卫浴制造厂家，主要生产永不爆裂的淋浴房、花洒、龙头。

sent.orig: I also have a bathroom conected to room. the bathroom has a bath and a shower.
sent.trans: 洗手间有一个盘浴还有一个淋浴。我用了绿色来装修。

sent.orig: Qinglun tufting Mendian company specializing in the production of bathroom mats, three-piece bathroom manufacturers.
sent.trans: 我公司是专业生产晴纶簇绒门垫，浴室垫，浴室三件套的厂家。

sent.orig: The classes are sub-standard child activity room, bedroom, bathroom, room, bathroom, glazed tiles flooring, flat non-slip.
sent.trans: 各班级均有符合标准的幼儿活动室、寝室、盥洗室、储藏室、卫生间，釉面砖铺地，平整防滑。
